Text: Oñ abu kʼi fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ li, i mute̩gu nyʼibe̩ uwo; abu kʼi kwoguguane̩, amako̩che̩-wñ la wʼugbo-wñ.
Oñ i mʼalu-wñ chi nako̩ ma e̩wñ kakini:
Ame̩nale ef afu gbede, todu ojane̩ e-efojale chʼe-ma.
Abo ku ma daido̩ gbede, todu ma anyʼuma e̩do̩.
Abo ku ma de̩ chikimi gbede, todu ama aje̩ ane̩ ile̩ e̩wñ ogu.
Abo kʼebi kpʼalugbe̩ e̩wñ o̩kpakpa akpa ma gbede, todu efu-ma ako̩.
Abo ku ma li ejumomi one̩ gbede, todu ma ali ma ejumomi.
Abo kʼe̩do̩-ma de̩ hiolo gbede, todu ama afʼeju-ma dʼO̩jo̩.
Abo ku ma bʼuja gbede, todu ma ado̩ ma ko̩ amo̩ma O̩jo̩.
Abo ku ma doli ma tod o̩kpakpa gbede, todu ojane̩ e-efojale chʼe-ma.
Me̩ gbede, e̩gba du ku ma kicha ñwu me̩, ku ma doli me̩ ku ma laño̩ ka e̩wñ bibi du nyʼume̩ olemi ofo todu mi.
Me̩ yo̩; me̩ nagwoguyo̩; todu o̩me̩ ku ma ara ñwu me̩ efojale chenana; todu abu ku ma doli amakache̩ ku ma jʼo̩gba-me̩ le̩ de̩.
Ame̩ chʼomu ane̩-ile̩. I muda che̩wñ kʼomu mud o̩gbo̩, e̩wñ ma adu tʼef uwñ kʼi ñʼarinyo̩ ta? I nyo̩ ku ma nʼache e̩wñ ge̩ n, chai ekorinyo̩ ma akorinyo̩ o̩do̩da kʼamone̩ ki fʼu kpetili mʼane̩.
Ame̩ chʼugane̩ ile̩. Ewo ki dʼoj uwo jʼamaja n.
Ma la adʼuna tʼagege ku ma dʼu gugu of agba n, chai oj akete; tak i amʼane̩ ne̩ ñw abo du ku ma jʼef unyi le̩.
Abe̩le̩ ugane̩-me̩ ki namʼane̩ ne̩ o̩gba amone̩, todu ku ma ki li uko̩lo̩-me̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩, ku ma la dʼojima ñw Ata-me̩ kʼi dʼefojale.
Me̩ ki nʼibe ka kʼu wa kʼu fʼaba o̩lo̩da kpʼo̩la amakache̩ la n; u lewa kʼu la n, chai todu kʼu che kʼi jo̩ kpa.
Todu, ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Gbogbo tak efojale kpʼane̩-ile̩ ki lale rinyo̩, ina-wñ re okate kpʼomi-wñ re okate alale rinyo̩ bʼo̩lo̩da te̩ n, gbogbo tak o̩chaka-wñ wache.

Todule̩ e̩ne̩ du ki fʼo̩la uko̩ ki nya-i okate la, kʼi laño̩ kʼamone̩ abe̩le̩, ma adʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ko̩ e̩ne̩ ki nya ojane̩ e-efojale; e̩ne̩ du ki muda che teju-wñ kʼi laño̩ dʼu ko̩ one̩, ma adʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ko̩ e̩ne̩ lile ojane̩ efojale.
Todu eka naka ñwu me̩-i kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼo̩kpakpa e-me̩ ma tʼe-amako̩takada kpʼe-amiFarisi le ge̩-ge̩ n, i nʼugbo du ku me̩ ñʼagudu tʼojane̩ e-efojale n.
Ame̩ gbo̩ ku ma ka ñw abo igbele kakini, E̩ ki kpone̩ n; e̩ne̩ du kʼi la kpone̩, ajo̩ i fa bʼo̩la-wñ ma le̩.

Omi muda ka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du kʼi chʼawe̩do̩ rʼo̩maye-wñ, fʼajo̩ fa bʼo̩la-wñ ma me̩; e̩ne̩ du kʼi la ka ñw o̩maye-wñ kakini, Uwe̩ e̩nidada, fʼo̩la abo̩hiala fa bʼo̩la-wñ ma le̩; oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi kakini, Uwe̩ e̩ne̩fule̩fu! i fʼuña ubie̩ e-una fa bʼo̩la-wñ ma me̩.
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ anʼe̩wñ ele-we̩ wa kʼe̩ dʼu tʼoj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, o̩mo̩ tak e̩ rewa ka kʼo̩maye-we̩ nʼo̩la kpʼuwe̩,
mak e̩ tʼe̩wñ ele-we̩ no̩ o̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ o̩mo̩, oñ e̩ lo kʼe̩ fʼo̩la-we̩ kpʼo̩maye-we̩ ño̩ru ejodudu, tak e̩ wa kʼe̩ dʼe̩wñ ele-we̩ wa che.
E̩ nachʼali e̩nyo̩ kpʼe̩no̩la-we̩ piopio abu kʼuwe̩ kpʼowñ jʼej o̩na ale, tode̩gba kʼe̩no̩la-we̩ amʼuwe̩ du ñw akajo̩ kʼakajo̩ la amʼuwe̩ du ñw idegeli, ku ma laño̩ mʼuwe̩ du rikpolo tef unyiuga;
ami, naka ñwe̩, inʼugbo du kʼe̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu n gbogbo tak e̩ fʼo̩me̩ anini otitala ra.
Ame̩ gbo̩ ku ma kakini, E̩ ki tene o̩ya e̩ne̩ omune̩ n.
Omi muda ka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ kʼi agʼonobule̩ kʼe̩ño̩-wñ dʼe̩do̩-wñ, mu te̩ mʼo̩ ef e̩do̩-wñ me̩.

I la che̩wñ kʼeju-we̩ e-awo̩to̩ fʼe̩ dahi, mʼu ne̩ kʼe̩ dʼu rikpolo tinyo̩ bʼo̩la-we̩ te̩; todu i nʼile ñw e̩ kʼe̩wñ año̩la-we̩ʼka kʼi lenyo̩, ku ma la we edʼo̩gbo̩ año̩la-we̩ du rikpoʼo̩ tef uña ubie̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ awo̩to̩ fʼe̩ dahi, mʼu ko̩da kʼe̩ dʼu rikpolo tinyo̩ bʼo̩la-we̩ te̩; todu i nʼile ñw e̩ kʼe̩wñ año̩la-we̩ʼka kʼi lenyo̩ kʼo̩gbo̩ año̩la-we̩ chaka kʼi we elo tef uña ubie̩.
Ma laño̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ki adʼo̩ya-wñ tinyo̩ kʼi namʼo̩takada e̩daru du ñw u;
omi muda ka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du kʼi adʼoya-wñ tinyo̩, ki ma chʼutodu abutabu-wñ n, mak owñ chʼe̩wñ kʼi ajo̩ko̩. E̩ne̩ du kʼi la gbʼe̩ne̩ ku ma du tinyo̩ chʼo̩ya, o̩ya one̩ i te̩mʼo̩ le̩.
Omune̩ de̩ ge̩: ame̩ gbo̩ ku ma ka ñw abo igbele kakini, E̩ ki ge̩bo̩ o̩lemi n, e̩wñ kʼe̩ ka kʼe̩ kpe̩bo̩ nʼo̩la-we̩ le̩, e̩ ki la che ñw Ondu.
Ama omi aka ñwu me̩ kakini, Me̩ ki ge̩bo̩ du n, i chaka chʼe-efojale, todabu kʼi chʼede O̩jo̩,
i chaka chʼane̩-ile̩-i, todabu ki chʼe̩wñ kʼi akʼe̩re̩ no, i chaka chʼe-Je̩rusale̩m, todabu kʼi chʼewo Onu lile.
E̩ ki la gʼoji-we̩ n, todabu kʼuwe̩ ma neke che kʼiloji-wñʼka kʼi mud efufu n, uwe̩ aneke che kʼi mud edudu n.
Ama o̩la kʼe̩ ka kʼi chʼEba, eba; O̩da, o̩da; e-du kʼi tʼe-i le kwʼugbo e̩ne̩bibi le̩.
Ame̩ gbo̩ ku ma kakini, Eju akoji eju, enyi la akoji enyi.
Omi muda ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Me̩ ki ko̩wo̩de kpʼe̩ne̩bibi le̩ n; ama e̩ne̩ du kʼi akʼuwe̩ awo eti awo̩to̩, e̩ ño̩ mʼe-ekeji rida te̩ ñw u ge̩;
i la che̩wñ ki dʼe̩ne̩ʼka e̩do̩ kʼi dʼuwe̩ ajo̩ kʼi mʼafe̩-we̩ gba, e̩ ki ño̩ tʼotogbo no̩ ñw u kpo̩fo̩ ge̩;
e̩ne̩ kʼi la achʼe̩ atʼe̩ne̩ le kʼe̩ lebʼo̩ imailiʼka, e̩ lebʼo̩ eji.
E̩ne̩ kʼi bi we̩ e̩wñ, e̩ nadʼu ñw u; oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi me̩ e̩wñ ugbo we̩, e̩ ki dubigbʼo̩ n.
Ame̩ gbo̩ ku ma kakini, E̩ ki fe̩do̩ ekeji-we̩, kʼe̩ la chulaka e̩nebi-we̩.
Omi muda ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki fe̩do̩ ame̩nebi-me̩, me̩ ki la chadua tod abo ku ma doli me̩,
todu kʼame̩ ki mud amo̩ma Ata-me̩ kʼi dʼefojale; todu i aje̩ ñw olu-wñ tadufu abʼoj ame̩ne̩bibi kpʼame̩ne̩nyo̩ ma, omi-wñ la alo̩ bʼoji ame̩no̩kpakpa kpai ame̩nuji ma.
Todu iche̩wñ ku me̩ fe̩do̩ abo ku ma fe̩do̩ me̩, e̩wñ chʼuro̩me̩ ku me̩ ane̩? I chaka chʼamagbo̩kane̩ onugo chʼe-le̩ n?
I la che̩wñ kʼi chʼamo̩maye-me̩ kate oñ ame̩ agwa ma, e̩wñ chʼache tule-me̩? I chaka chʼabo uche̩ichi onugo chʼe-le̩ n?
Todule̩ ame̩ ki chʼabo ku ma mufu kpa alu kʼAta-me̩ kʼi dʼefojale chʼE̩ne̩ ki mufu kpa.
